desc.exportHint: Export the transaction list into a pdf

landing.title: Bunny Bill
landing.subtitle: Let's Split the Bill easily
landing.featurePwa: Simply "Add to Home Screen" and use it anytime
landing.featureEasy: Friendly interface and easy to use

dataSync.head: Data Sync
dataSync.hint: Bind your devices with an E-mail address to sync data.
dataSync.label: E-mail to bind
dataSync.bindHint: The code has sent to your email, please check.
dataSync.unbindHint: After unbinding, data added on this device will not be synchronized with other devices until the device is bound again.

add2HomeScreen.iosStep1: Open this website with Safari and tap the share icon at the bottom of the screen
add2HomeScreen.iosStep3: Click "Add" in the upper right corner
add2HomeScreen.androidStep1: Open this site in Chrome and click on the "More" icon at the top right of the screen
add2HomeScreen.done: After completing the above steps, you can see the icon of Bunny Bill on the main screen of the phone

bookDetail.noMemberHint: Please click "Member" to add members, and then we can start
bookDetail.donateNote: Thanks for using Bunny Bill! If you like our current results, you can donate us to provide better services.

bookSetting.head: Settings
bookSetting.systemDeleteHint: If there is no any update for 100 days, the book would be removed by system.
bookSetting.deleteHint: Note that this action would only delete the book in this device. It would not affect others' devices.

member.head: Members
member.shareText: I'd like to share "{{book}}" with you. Please click the link.
member.friendHint: The ID can be found in System Setting

editTx.weightDesc: It is distributed according to the number of shares held by each person, and if the amount is entered, the amount will take priority.
editTx.pctDesc: Distribute according to the percentage of each person, and you can also enter the amount.
editTx.pmDesc: After deducting the personal extra amount, the remaining amount is divided equally among all the owners.
editTx.currencyHint: Please go to book settings to configure currencies.

memberModal.head: Select your nickname
memberModal.hint: You can also add your nickname later

error.default: Something went wrong, please try again later or contact us to fix it.
error.tooFrequent: We've sent you the code. If you want to resend email, please wait for 5 minutes.
